text: Logical logging requires less data written in each log record than physical logging. Difficult to implement recovery with logical logging if you have concurrent txns. — Hard to determine which parts of the database may have been modified by a query before crash. — Also takes longer to recover because you must re-execute every txn all over again. ; = £2CMU-DB : _;'—.‘\_ ‘ p ’:‘Ë : s ' E | > >l ‘D 1:03:12 / 1:15:18 - BUFFER POOL POLICIES > m * E D :] 20 - Database Logging Schemes (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
